sentence: I go to the shop with my mom.
I hurt my shin when I fell down.
Dad keeps tools in the shed.
I put my dish in the sink.
The cat has a long lash on its eye.
I crush the can with my foot.
The big ship sails on the sea.
I shot the ball into the net.
I have a red rash on my arm.
I dash to the door quickly.
I wish for a new toy.
